from rest_framework import serializers

from client.models.company import Company



[文档]class SupplyChainsSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    """
    供应链企业列表序列化器
    """
    status = serializers.CharField(source="companyreviewlog.status", read_only=True)
    register_status = serializers.SerializerMethodField()


[文档]    def get_register_status(self, obj):
        """
        一期 注册状态写死
        @param obj:
        @return:
        """
        register_status = "已注册"
        return register_status
